attributes.action: Rebalance the wage gap by changing the way pay rises are distributed
attributes.additional_details: The wage gap in this country is ever widenening due to the way pay rises are made in this country, most, if not all companies give a percentage of a workers salary as a pay rise, this is next to nothing for the lowest paid and a vast sum to those highest paid workers, I propose to change that, bery simply, by adding together the entire companies wage bill, then taking a percentage of that entire bill and sharing that equally, resulting in every worker recieving the same pay rise.
